text: Goldtree Engine is a computer program published by Goldtree Enterprises as a play aid for role-playing games. ==Description== Goldtree Engine is software to assist in running role-playing game adventures in fantasy cities. ==Reviews== *Dragon #209 (Sep., 1994) *Shadis #21 (Oct., 1995)https://index.rpg.net/display-entry.phtml?mainid=5966 ==References== Category:Role-playing game software
title: Goldtree Engine
